channel.title: Compiling and Run Troubles :(
channel.description:
PLEASE REPLY! I really need help :(
Hello everyone, I have a few problems and I'm hoping you guys can help me :) First, I use tonypker13's Rubik's Scape. When I use the compiler I get a error: Note: Some input files use or override a deprecated API. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecationfor details. then underneath it says Finished!
2. I use the run.bat that is provided, and when it starts up the server, it says "Sorry an error has occured whilst loading Rubik's Scape" Then gives me a couple of solutions which don't work.
Afterward I downloaded Perfect Compiler V 1.9. 3.I compile it gives me the same error as number 1 and then says Files Compiled successfully. I take it that it worked. :s
4.Then I run and it says "You do not have a server.class. Make sure you have used the compiler with your server before running it."
Those are my problems, basically number 2 and number 4. Please try your best to help me out. Thanks. :D
Whoops just noticed the compiling topic :O

item.title: Compiling and Run Troubles :(

PLEASE REPLY! I really need help

Hello everyone, I have a few problems and I’m hoping you guys can help me
First, I use tonypker13’s Rubik’s Scape. When I use the compiler I get a error:
Note: Some input files use or override a deprecated API.
Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecationfor details.
then underneath it says Finished!

  1. I use the run.bat that is provided, and when it starts up the server, it says
    “Sorry an error has occured whilst loading Rubik’s Scape” Then gives me a couple of solutions which don’t work.

Afterward I downloaded Perfect Compiler V 1.9.
3.I compile it gives me the same error as number 1 and then says Files Compiled successfully. I take it that it worked. :s

4.Then I run and it says “You do not have a server.class. Make sure you have used the compiler with your server before running it.”

Those are my problems, basically number 2 and number 4.
Please try your best to help me out. Thanks.
